name: group-ib-threat-intelligence-attribution-feed
label: Group IB Threat Intelligence & Attribution Feed
description: Use Group-IB Threat Intelligence & Attribution Feed integration to fetch IOCs from various Group-IB collections.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the Group IB server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.description: Username used to access the Group IB server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.description: Password used to access the Group IB server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Search Indicator
operations.description: Find indicator and its metadata on Group IB Database.

parameters.title: Indicator
parameters.name: q
parameters.tooltip: Value of the indicator to search for in GroupIB DB.
parameters.description: Value of the indicator to search for in GroupIB DB.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Limit how many records to return per match.
parameters.description: Limit how many records to return per match.

operations.title: Get Indicators
operations.description: Retrieves a limited number of indicators for the specified Group IB collection, and all indicators for a particular incident if you have specified the incident ID.

parameters.title: Collection
parameters.name: collection
parameters.tooltip: GIB Collection to get indicators from.
parameters.description: The Group IB Collection from which you want to retrieve indicators. You can choose from the following options: compromised/mule, compromised/imei, attacks/ddos, attacks/deface, attacks/phishing, attacks/phishing_kit, hi/threat, apt/threat, osi/vulnerability, suspicious_ip/tor_node, suspicious_ip/open_proxy, suspicious_ip/socks_proxy, or malware/cnc.

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The incident ID whose associated indicators you want to retrieve from Group IB.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Limit of indicators to display in War Room
parameters.description: The maximum number of indicators that you want to display in the War Room. You can specify the following values: 10, 20, 30, 40, or 50. By default, the limit is set to 50.
